00011 ServiceProxy::ServiceProxy( unsigned int PeerId, SimpleString eHostName, int eControlPort )
00012     : ControlClient(PeerId)
00013 {
00014     HostName    = eHostName;
00015     ControlPort = eControlPort;
00016     FullDescription = false;
00017 
00018     if ( ConnectToCtrlServer(HostName, ControlPort) == true )
00019     {
00020         UpdateDescription();
00021     }
00022     else
00023     {
00024         // throw  SimpleException("ServiceProxy failed");
00025     }
00026 }

00028 ServiceProxy::ServiceProxy( unsigned int PeerId, SimpleString eHostName, int eControlPort, ServiceProperties& ServiceProps )
00029     : ControlClient(PeerId)
00030 {
00031     SimpleString TmpString;
00032     VariableAttribute * VarAtt;
00033     InOutputAttribute * IOAtt;
00034     int Pos;
00035     unsigned int Port;
00036 
00037     HostName    = eHostName;
00038     ControlPort = eControlPort;
00039     FullDescription = false;
00040 
00041     // Is the description
00042     TmpString = ServiceProps["desc"].GetValue();
00043     //if ( ServiceProps.IsDefined( "name" ) )
00044     //{
00045     //  OmiscidError( "Warning, forced fallback for '%s' (%s).\n",
00046     //          ServiceProps[NameString].GetValue().GetStr(), ServiceProps["id"].GetValue().GetStr() );
00047     //}
00048     //else
00049     //{
00050     //  OmiscidError( "Warning, forced fallback for %8.8x.\n", PeerId );
00051     //}
00052     //if ( TmpString == "forced fallback" )
00053     // OmiscidTrace( "Working on'%s' (%s).\n",
00054     //   ServiceProps[ControlServer::NameString].GetValue().GetStr(), ServiceProps["id"].GetValue().GetStr() );
00055 
00056     if ( TmpString == "full" )
00057     {
00058         FullDescription = true;
00059     }
00060 
00061     for( Pos = 0; Pos <  ServiceProps.GetNumberOfProperties(); Pos++ )
00062     {
00063         ServiceProperty& LocalProp = ServiceProps.GetProperty(Pos);
00064 
00065         if ( LocalProp.GetName() == "desc" )
00066         {
00067             continue;
00068         }
00069 
00070         // SimpleString TmpName = LocalProp.GetName();
00071 
00072         // Parse property
00073         TmpString = LocalProp.GetValue();
00074         char * TmpChar = (char*)TmpString.GetStr();
00075         switch( TmpString[0] )
00076         {
00077             // Work on Variables
00078             case 'c':
00079                 if ( TmpString.GetLength() <= 2 || TmpString[1] != '/' )
00080                 {
00081                     FullDescription = false;
00082                     continue;
00083                 }
00084 
00085                 // Ok, something like c/...
00086                 VarAtt = new OMISCID_TLM VariableAttribute( LocalProp.GetName() );
00087                 if ( VarAtt == NULL )
00088                 {
00089                     FullDescription = false;
00090                     continue;
00091                 }
00092                 VarAtt->SetValue( TmpChar+2 );
00093                 VarAtt->SetAccessConstant();
00094                 listVariableName.Add( LocalProp.GetName() );
00095                 listVariableAttr.Add( VarAtt );
00096                 break;
00097 
00098             case 'r':
00099                 if ( TmpString.GetLength() != 1 )
00100                 {
00101                     FullDescription = false;
00102                     continue;
00103                 }
00104 
00105                 // Ok, something like r/...
00106                 VarAtt = new OMISCID_TLM VariableAttribute( LocalProp.GetName() );
00107                 if ( VarAtt == NULL )
00108                 {
00109                     FullDescription = false;
00110                     continue;
00111                 }
00112                 VarAtt->SetAccessRead();
00113                 listVariableName.Add( LocalProp.GetName() );
00114                 listVariableAttr.Add( VarAtt );
00115                 break;
00116 
00117             case 'w':
00118                 if ( TmpString.GetLength() != 1 )
00119                 {
00120                     FullDescription = false;
00121                     continue;
00122                 }
00123 
00124                 // Ok, something like w/...
00125                 VarAtt = new OMISCID_TLM VariableAttribute( LocalProp.GetName() );
00126                 if ( VarAtt == NULL )
00127                 {
00128                     FullDescription = false;
00129                     continue;
00130                 }
00131                 VarAtt->SetAccessReadWrite();
00132                 listVariableName.Add( LocalProp.GetName() );
00133                 listVariableAttr.Add( VarAtt );
00134                 break;
00135 
00136             // Work on Connectors
00137             case 'i':
00138                 if ( TmpString[1] != '/' || TmpString[2] < '0' || TmpString[2] > '9' )
00139                 {
00140                     FullDescription = false;
00141                     continue;
00142                 }
00143 
00144                 // Check if we've got a correct port
00145                 Port = 0;
00146                 Port = atoi(TmpChar+2);
00147                 if ( Port == 0 || Port >= 0x0000ffff )
00148                 {
00149                     FullDescription = false;
00150                     continue;
00151                 }
00152 
00153                 IOAtt = new OMISCID_TLM InOutputAttribute( LocalProp.GetName(), NULL, AnInput );
00154                 if ( IOAtt == NULL )
00155                 {
00156                     FullDescription = false;
00157                     continue;
00158                 }
00159                 IOAtt->SetTcpPort( (unsigned short)Port );
00160                 listInputName.Add( LocalProp.GetName() );
00161                 listInputAttr.Add( IOAtt );
00162                 break;
00163 
00164             case 'o':
00165                 if ( TmpString[1] != '/' || TmpString[2] < '0' || TmpString[2] > '9' )
00166                 {
00167                     FullDescription = false;
00168                     continue;
00169                 }
00170 
00171                 // Check if we've got a correct port
00172                 Port = 0;
00173                 Port = atoi(TmpChar+2);
00174                 if ( Port == 0 || Port >= 0x0000ffff )
00175                 {
00176                     FullDescription = false;
00177                     continue;
00178                 }
00179 
00180                 IOAtt = new OMISCID_TLM InOutputAttribute( LocalProp.GetName(), NULL, AnOutput );
00181                 if ( IOAtt == NULL )
00182                 {
00183                     FullDescription = false;
00184                     continue;
00185                 }
00186                 IOAtt->SetTcpPort( (unsigned short)Port );
00187                 listOutputName.Add( LocalProp.GetName() );
00188                 listOutputAttr.Add( IOAtt );
00189                 break;
00190 
00191             case 'd':
00192                 if ( TmpString[1] != '/' || TmpString[2] < '0' || TmpString[2] > '9' )
00193                 {
00194                     FullDescription = false;
00195                     continue;
00196                 }
00197 
00198                 // Check if we've got a correct port
00199                 Port = 0;
00200                 Port = atoi(TmpChar+2);
00201                 if ( Port == 0 || Port >= 0x0000ffff )
00202                 {
00203                     FullDescription = false;
00204                     continue;
00205                 }
00206 
00207                 IOAtt = new OMISCID_TLM InOutputAttribute( LocalProp.GetName(), NULL, AnInOutput );
00208                 if ( IOAtt == NULL )
00209                 {
00210                     FullDescription = false;
00211                     continue;
00212                 }
00213                 IOAtt->SetTcpPort( (unsigned short)Port );
00214                 listInOutputName.Add( LocalProp.GetName() );
00215                 listInOutputAttr.Add( IOAtt );
00216                 break;
00217 
00218             default:
00219                 FullDescription = false;
00220                 continue;
00221         }
00222     }
00223 
00224     //if ( FullDescription == false )
00225     //{
00226     //  UpdateDescription();
00227     //}
00228 }

00247 SimpleList<SimpleString>& ServiceProxy::GetInputConnectors()
00248 {
00249     // We got everything
00250     if ( FullDescription == true )
00251     {
00252         return GetInputNameList();
00253     }
00254 
00255     // In other case, update the description
00256     UpdateDescription();
00257 
00258     return GetInputNameList();
00259 }

00304 void ServiceProxy::UpdateDescription()
00305 {
00306     if ( FullDescription == true )
00307     {
00308         return;
00309     }
00310 
00311     if ( IsConnected() == false )
00312     {
00313         ConnectToCtrlServer( HostName, ControlPort );
00314     }
00315 
00316     if ( QueryDetailedDescription() == true )
00317     {
00318         FullDescription = true;
00319     }
00320 
00321     // else the value of FullDescription remain the same
00322 }

00342 unsigned int ServiceProxy::GetPeerId()
00343 {
00344     try
00345     {
00346         SimpleString lPeerId = GetVariableValue( CommonServiceValues::NameForPeerIdString );
00347 
00348         return ComTools::PeerIdFromString(lPeerId);
00349     }
00350     catch( SimpleException & )
00351     {
00352     }
00353 
00354     return 0;

00379 bool ServiceProxy::SetVariableValue(const SimpleString VarName, const SimpleString Value)
00380 {
00381     // Update description if needed
00382     if ( FullDescription == false )
00383     {
00384         UpdateDescription();
00385     }
00386 
00387     if ( IsConnected() == false )
00388     {
00389         // Update description if needed
00390         if ( ConnectToCtrlServer(HostName, ControlPort) == false )
00391         {
00392             throw SimpleException("Can not connect to the Service.");
00393         }
00394     }
00395 
00396     if ( QueryVariableModif(VarName, Value) == NULL )
00397     {
00398         return false;
00399     }
00400 
00401     return true;
00402 }

00409 SimpleString ServiceProxy::GetVariableValue(const SimpleString VarName)
00410 {
00411     VariableAttribute * pVar = FindVariable(VarName);
00412     if ( pVar == NULL )
00413     {
00414         SimpleString ErrMesg;
00415         ErrMesg = "Unknown variable '";
00416         ErrMesg += VarName;
00417         ErrMesg += "'. Call HasVariableFirst.";
00418         throw  SimpleException( ErrMesg );
00419     }
00420 
00421     // If the variable is initialised
00422     if ( pVar->IsInitialised() )
00423     {
00424         // If we can get the current value
00425         if ( pVar->GetAccess() == ConstantAccess && FullDescription == true )
00426         {
00427             return pVar->GetValue();
00428         }
00429     }
00430 
00431     if ( IsConnected() == false )
00432     {
00433         // Update description if needed
00434         if ( ConnectToCtrlServer(HostName, ControlPort) == false )
00435         {
00436             throw SimpleException("Can not connect to the Service.");
00437         }
00438     }
00439 
00440     // Il all other cases
00441     pVar = QueryVariableDescription( VarName );
00442     if ( pVar == NULL )
00443     {
00444         // This one *here* should not appear
00445         throw SimpleException( "Could not retrieve variable '" + VarName + "'." );
00446     }
00447     return pVar->GetValue();
00448 }

00456 {

00458     if ( pVar == NULL )

00462         ErrMesg += VarName;
00463         ErrMesg += "'. Call HasVariableFirst.";
00464         throw  SimpleException( ErrMesg );
00465     }
00466 
00467     // If the variable is initialised
00468     if ( pVar->IsInitialised() )
00469     {
00470         // return the current type
00471         return pVar->GetType();
00472     }
00473 
00474     if ( IsConnected() == false )
00475     {
00476         // Update description if needed
00477         if ( ConnectToCtrlServer(HostName, ControlPort) == false )
00478         {
00479             throw SimpleException("Can not connect to the Service.");
00480         }
00481     }
00482 
00483     // Il all other cases
00484     pVar = QueryVariableDescription( VarName );
00485     if ( pVar == NULL )
00486     {
00487         // This one *here* should not appear
00488         throw SimpleException( "Could not retrieve variable '" + VarName + "'." );
00489     }
00490 
00491     return pVar->GetType();
00492 }

00499 SimpleString ServiceProxy::GetVariableDescription(const SimpleString VarName)
00500 {
00501     VariableAttribute * pVar = FindVariable(VarName);
00502     if ( pVar == NULL )
00503     {
00504         SimpleString ErrMesg;
00505         ErrMesg = "Unknown variable '";
00506         ErrMesg += VarName;
00507         ErrMesg += "'. Call HasVariableFirst.";
00508         throw  SimpleException( ErrMesg );
00509     }
00510 
00511     // If the variable is initialised
00512     if ( pVar->IsInitialised() )
00513     {
00514         // return the current description
00515         return pVar->GetDescription();
00516     }
00517 
00518     if ( IsConnected() == false )
00519     {
00520         // Update description if needed
00521         if ( ConnectToCtrlServer(HostName, ControlPort) == false )
00522         {
00523             throw SimpleException("Can not connect to the Service.");
00524         }
00525     }
00526 
00527     // Il all other cases
00528     pVar = QueryVariableDescription( VarName );
00529     if ( pVar == NULL )
00530     {
00531         // This one *here* should not appear
00532         throw SimpleException( "Could not retrieve variable '" + VarName + "'." );
00533     }
00534 
00535     return pVar->GetDescription();

00543 bool ServiceProxy::AddRemoteVariableChangeListener(const SimpleString VarName, RemoteVariableChangeListener * Listener )
00544 {
00545     // Serach the variable
00546     VariableAttribute * pVar = FindVariable( VarName );
00547     if ( pVar == NULL )
00548     {
00549         // not found
00550         return false;
00551     }
00552 
00553     if ( IsConnected() == false )
00554     {
00555         // Update description if needed
00556         if ( ConnectToCtrlServer(HostName, ControlPort) == false )
00557         {
00558             throw SimpleException("Can not connect to the Service.");
00559         }
00560     }
00561 
00562     // Add information about me
00563     Listener->SetUserData( this );
00564 
00565     // If we can not add the listener
00566     if ( pVar->AddListener( Listener ) == false )
00567     {
00568         // Add information about me
00569         Listener->SetUserData( NULL );
00570 
00571         // Say there was a problem
00572         return false;
00573     }
00574 
00575     // If it is the first listener, subscribe to the variable changes
00576     if ( pVar->GetNumberOfListeners() == 1 )
00577     {
00578         // first listener
00579         // Subscribe to the variable changes
00580         Subscribe( VarName );
00581     }
00582 
00583     // ok
00584     return true;
00585 }
00586 
00592 bool ServiceProxy::RemoveRemoteVariableChangeListener(const SimpleString VarName, RemoteVariableChangeListener * Listener )
00593 {
00594     bool ret;
00595 
00596     // Serach for the variable
00597     VariableAttribute * pVar = FindVariable( VarName );
00598     if ( pVar == NULL )
00599     {
00600         // Not found
00601         return false;
00602     }
00603 
00604     if ( IsConnected() == false )
00605     {
00606         // Update description if needed
00607         if ( ConnectToCtrlServer(HostName, ControlPort) == false )
00608         {
00609             throw SimpleException("Can not connect to the Service.");
00610         }
00611     }
00612 
00613     // Aswk to remove the listener
00614     ret = pVar->RemoveListener( Listener );
00615     if ( ret == false )
00616     {
00617         // something goes wrong
00618         return false;
00619     }
00620 
00621     // Do we have any listener left ?
00622     if ( pVar->GetNumberOfListeners() == 0 )
00623     {
00624         // If no, unsubscribe to the variable changes
00625         Unsubscribe( VarName );
00626     }
00627 
00628     // say, it was ok
00629     return true;
00630 }

00647 bool ServiceProxy::HasConnector( const SimpleString ConnectorName, ConnectorKind ItsKind /* UnkownConnectorKind */ )
00648 {
00649     InOutputAttribute * pAtt = FindConnector(ConnectorName);
00650     if ( pAtt == NULL )
00651     {
00652         return false;
00653     }
00654     if ( ItsKind != UnkownConnectorKind && pAtt->GetType() != ItsKind )
00655     {
00656         return false;
00657     }
00658     return true;
00659 }

00666 SimpleString ServiceProxy::FindConnector( unsigned int PeerId )
00667 {
00668     // Update description if needed
00669     if ( FullDescription == false )
00670     {
00671         UpdateDescription();
00672     }
00673 
00674     // Serach for the connector
00675     for( listInputAttr.First(); listInputAttr.NotAtEnd(); listInputAttr.Next() )
00676     {
00677         if ( listInputAttr.GetCurrent()->GetPeerId() == PeerId )
00678         {
00679             return listInputAttr.GetCurrent()->GetName();
00680         }
00681     }
00682 
00683     for( listOutputAttr.First(); listOutputAttr.NotAtEnd(); listOutputAttr.Next() )
00684     {
00685         if ( listOutputAttr.GetCurrent()->GetPeerId() == PeerId )
00686         {
00687             return listOutputAttr.GetCurrent()->GetName();
00688         }
00689     }
00690 
00691     for( listInOutputAttr.First(); listInOutputAttr.NotAtEnd(); listInOutputAttr.Next() )
00692     {
00693         if ( listInOutputAttr.GetCurrent()->GetPeerId() == PeerId )
00694         {
00695             return listInOutputAttr.GetCurrent()->GetName();
00696         }
00697     }
00698 
00699     return SimpleString::EmptyString;
00700 }

00707 SimpleString ServiceProxy::GetConnectorDescription(const SimpleString ConnectorName)
00708 {
00709     InOutputAttribute * pAtt;
00710     pAtt = FindConnector( ConnectorName );
00711     if ( pAtt == (InOutputAttribute *)NULL )
00712     {
00713         SimpleString ErrMesg;
00714         ErrMesg = "Unknown Connector '";
00715         ErrMesg += ConnectorName;
00716         ErrMesg += "'. Call HasConnector First.";
00717         throw  SimpleException( ErrMesg );
00718     }
00719 
00720     return pAtt->GetDescription();
00721 }

00723 bool ServiceProxy::GetConnectionInfos( const SimpleString Connector, ConnectionInfos& Connection )
00724 {
00725     InOutputAttribute * pAtt = FindConnector( Connector );
00726     if ( pAtt == (InOutputAttribute *)NULL )
00727     {
00728         OmiscidError( "Could not find connector nammed '%s'\n", Connector.GetStr() );
00729         return false;
00730     }
00731 
00732     Connection.TcpPort = pAtt->GetTcpPort();
00733     Connection.UdpPort = pAtt->GetUdpPort();
00734     Connection.Type        = pAtt->GetType();
00735 
00736     return true;
00737 }

00739 // Utility functions
00740 VariableAttribute * ServiceProxy::FindVariable( SimpleString VarName )
00741 {
00742     // Update description if needed
00743     if ( FullDescription == false )
00744     {
00745         UpdateDescription();
00746     }
00747 
00748     VariableAttribute * pVar = ControlClient::FindVariable(VarName);
00749     // if ( pVar == NULL )
00750     // {
00751     //   pVar = ControlClient::QueryVariableDescription( VarName );
00752     // }
00753     if ( pVar == NULL )
00754     {
00755         if ( FullDescription == true )
00756         {
00757             // Not found
00758             OmiscidError( "Variable '%s' not found\n", VarName.GetStr() );
00759             return NULL;
00760         }
00761 
00762         if ( IsConnected() == false )
00763         {
00764             // Update description if needed
00765             if ( ConnectToCtrlServer(HostName, ControlPort) == false )
00766             {
00767                 throw SimpleException("Can not connect to the Service.");
00768             }
00769         }
00770 
00771         // Try to get the variable if we do not get the full description
00772         pVar = QueryVariableDescription(VarName);
00773     }
00774     return pVar;
00775 }
00776 
00777 InOutputAttribute * ServiceProxy::FindConnector( SimpleString ConnectortName )
00778 {
00779     InOutputAttribute * pAtt;
00780 
00781     // Update description if needed
00782     if ( FullDescription == false )
00783     {
00784         UpdateDescription();
00785     }
00786 
00787     if (   (pAtt = FindInput(ConnectortName)) != NULL                                   // Is is an Input ?
00788         || (pAtt = FindOutput(ConnectortName)) != NULL                                  // Is it an Output
00789         || (pAtt = FindInOutput(ConnectortName)) != NULL                                // Is is an InOutput ?
00790         )
00791     {
00792         // We found it
00793         return pAtt;
00794     }
00795 
00796     // Here we did not find the connector
00797     OmiscidError( "Connector '%s' not found\n", ConnectortName.GetStr() );
00798     return NULL;
00799 }
